name: Mega Man (itch) (houssamChab)
description:
A Mega man Fangame in unity

in this version you can play the Commando stage from mega man 10

i am willing to procced in this game development if you want to stay tune for more update follow me on itch.io or subscribe to my channel on Youtube.

Controls Arrowkeys, left ctrl, space, z, x, c, v

joystick supported
